publish.title: Publish contest
publish.subtitleNotReady: Contest is not ready to publish.
publish.subtitlePublished: This contest has already been published.
publish.subtitleReady: Make this contest visible and active for participants.
publish.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to publish "{{name}}"?

errors.contestEndTooEarly: Contest end is too early to cover deadlines. Suggested end >= {{date}}.
errors.retakeNoWeight: Retake round '{{name}}' has no weight (missing questions/test cases/criteria).
errors.autoEvalMissingConfig: Auto-evaluation round '{{name}}' must have either a mock test file or test cases.
errors.noJudges: No judges assigned to the contest for manual problems.

validation.yearMin: Year must be equal or greater than 2025
validation.name: Contest name is required
validation.imgUrl: Please enter a valid URL (must start with http or https)
validation.startPast: Start date cannot be in the past
validation.endAfterStart: End date must be after the start date
validation.endPast: End date cannot be in the past
validation.regStartPast: Registration start cannot be in the past
validation.regEndAfterStart: Registration end must be after registration start
validation.regEndAfterContestStart: Registration end cannot be after contest start date
validation.regEndPast: Registration end cannot be in the past
validation.teamMinInteger: Min team members must be an integer
validation.teamMinNegative: Min team members cannot be negative
validation.teamMaxInteger: Max team members must be an integer
validation.teamMaxRange: Max team members must be between 1 and 50
validation.teamMaxMin: Max team members must be >= Min team members
validation.teamLimitRange: Team limit must be between 1 and 10000
validation.contestNameExists: Contest name already exists for this year.
validation.registrationEndEarlierThanStart: Registration end time is earlier than or equal to requested start.
validation.registrationEndAfterContestStart: Registration end cannot be after contest start.
validation.contestEnded: Contest already ended. Cannot start now.
validation.contestNotStartedFuture: Contest has not started yet (start time is in the future).
validation.registrationEndBeforeStart: Registration end cannot be before registration start.
validation.registrationNotEnded: Registration has not ended yet. Cannot start contest now.
validation.roundsEndAfterNow: The contest cannot be ended because one or more rounds have not finished yet.

suggestion.serverColdStart: Unable to connect to server. The server might be waking up (cold start), please try again in 30 seconds.
